examples.korean: The whole community was aroused by the crime. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 범죄 행위에 전 지역 주민이 각성을 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The whole community was aroused by the crime. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: If the players think they can win this match easily, they are in for a rude awakening. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 선수들이 이번 시합을 쉽게 이길 수 있다고 생각한다면 예상 밖의 각성을 하게 될 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If the players think they can win this match easily, they are in for a rude awakening. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The drug improved mental alertness. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 약은 정신적 각성을 증진시켰다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: The drug improved mental alertness. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Good communication is as stimulating as black coffee and just as hard to sleep after. (Anne Morrow Lindbergh) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 좋은 의사 소통은 블랙 커피만큼 자극적이고 각성 효과도 뛰어나다. (앤 모로우 린드버그, 언어명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: Good communication is as stimulating as black coffee and just as hard to sleep after. (Anne Morrow Lindbergh) Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I shouldn’t have drank coffee, now I’m super wired and probably won’t be able to fall asleep any time soon. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 커피를 안 마셨어야 했어. 지금 완전 각성되어서 금방 잠들 수 있을 것 같지가 않아. DARAKWON
examples.english: I shouldn’t have drank coffee, now I’m super wired and probably won’t be able to fall asleep any time soon. Add to Wordbook
